name: Wait! Where's My Lunch? Demo
description: Wait! Where’s My Lunch!? is an over-the-top stealth adventure game from Magic Dragon Studios. Follow Bryce, while he embarks on important quest in the middle of a world ending apocalypse. What is his quest? To find the most important survival item … his lunch! In this small game you'll find a short single player adventure, including a couple different weapons, stealth, and goofy kills. Hopefully you enjoy and stick around for future updates.
